Item Description The ESP E-II M-II NT UC has a 3-piece maple neck with a 25.5" scale, fashioned in the neck-through-body style, and is fitted with a rosewood fingerboard and 24 extra-jumbo frets. The strings are secured by a set of Gotoh locking tuners, along with a Floyd Rose Original locking tremolo bridge.
